channel.title: Trainscape (525 loading 602)
channel.description:
{Sorry for no pics the client i'm using is insidiax's client and i cant screenshot and i don't know how to screenshot with my hypercam 2}
[u][shadow=green,right]TRAINSCAPE 525 LOADING 602[/shadow][/u]
ADDED THINGS
gambling for players New sprites Smoother npc chat - everyone sees it New stuff in pk point shop casket system new starter new home deleted money pouch orb so no one dupes better training - combat wise (xp) added ::dice command Fixed skillcape shop - basicly just put skillcapes in different shop trimmed skillcape's for donator's only more stuff added to donator chest avatar of destruction drops casket
THINGS I WILL DO IN V2
New training New monster gfx Better Pking and Better sprites.
CREDITS
Me - 30% Insidiax - 60% java classes - 5% tutorials - 5%

item.title: Trainscape (525 loading 602)
item.dc:creator: @xEthanx xEthanx
item.description:
@xEthanx wrote:

[quote=“eclipse rsps, post:4, topic:443367”][quote author=longz link=topic=546055.msg4005531#msg4005531 date=1338588960]
I code. I draw, animate and I’m a student at VCU for animation and graphic design which is my major.I would love to help you make your sever come to life.I have all source codes.I have coded for soulsplit,rsquest, and thats about it I also play xbox and I’m 20 years old. Would love to be apart of your team as the Webclient designer!
[/quote]
who do we need to know you play xbox lmfao[/quote]
I’m guessing to make them relate to his life a little? It’s like when people that watch gamers on YouTube, they say “Quit talking about the game so much, talk about you” because their interested in each other’s lives.

Before derailing this topic into something that’s completely irrelevant like I tend to do a lot, I’ll give my two cents on this. I honestly think you should have pictures before considering posting. Because no one’s going to want to play a server that may not be legit, know what I mean?

Read full topic
